content: this pattern is for a knit bear & bunny in one size approx 4 25 head to toe detailed instructions and photos are included to help you get get consistency works up very quickly and fits perfectly in a newborn s hands pattern is worked on straight needles includes sizes ♥one size fits all ♥ yarn weight light worsted / dk weight approximately 40 yards skill level intermediate simple stitches worked on straight needles with seaming you have permission to sell the finished product made from this pattern although it is not required a link back to the designer for online sales it is appreciated simplysycamore com rewriting reselling distributing or copying the pattern itself is strictly prohibited thank you for your understanding and cooperation all images text and the pattern itself are copyright © simply sycamore | 2019
